title: What can I do if the touchscreen doesn't work?
answer:
l   If this happens when there is water or oil on your hand or the touchscreen:

Use a dry cloth to wipe your hand and the screen.

Press the power button consecutively twice to restart the screen to let it automatically calibrate.

l   If this happens when the phone is charging through an in-car charger or non-standard charger:

In-car or non-standard chargers may cause touchscreen failure. Use the charger that comes with your phone for charging.

If the problem persists, contact Huawei technical support or take your phone to an authorized Huawei service center.
